summary:
Seasoned consultant (PhD + MBA) with 25+ years experience and an international background including a 6 year consecutive stay in the USA.  Available for assignments in knowledge and capital intensive industries. Focused on:

1.	How can I best help you in achieving your mission, goals and objectives?
2.	What change in trends will you be challenging?
3.	How do your future and the one of your competition look alike - are they different?
4.	Will others follow where you lead?
5.	Do you nourish & cherish a top 5 list of 'strategically attainable objectives'?

Specialties: Strategy, Mergers & Acquisitions, Option(s) structures, Business Models, Advanced Estate Planning, Executive Coaching and Board Issues. 

Background:

Dr. Peters has in addition to his 25+ in Business, 10+ years experience in the Arts and Sciences and in parallel 40+ in volunteer management.  

He has received awards in business and education, is listed in 'Who's is Who in World' and has been interviewed for both (live) radio and print in the USA and Europe. His work - leading to new business - has been recorded by 'CNN' for television. He collaborated with frontiers of new music: Dizzy Gillespie, John Cage and Ferry & Garnefsky (No. 1 hits in UK; AUS, Gold in JPN). He is as (co)author widely published: 30+ peer reviewed journal articles. Book chapters on his work are available via Amazon.com. He holds several issued USA patents (trademarked). He served on non-profit, academic and corporate boards (USA and EU).

Dr. Peters is an alumnus of Utrecht University (PhD), Houston Baptist University (MBA) and MIT (Sloan School of Management - Internet Strategy). In addition he completed Executive programs through Rice (Intellectual Property), Houston Baptist (Asian Studies) and Harvard University (E-Business).

awards.title: MBA Oath
awards.description:
In a larger context, the MBA Oath represents a small step towards professionalizing the management field in ways similar to the medical and law professions.  The MBA Oath is the management equivalent of the Hippocratic Oath taken by doctors.  

In a ''Harvard Business Review'' piece published in October 2008, Khurana and Nohria linked the connection between professionalism of a profession and the profession's ability to deliver value to society: True professions bear a code of conduct, and the meaning and consequences of those codes are taught as part of the formal education of their members. A governing body, composed of respected members of the profession, oversees members’ compliance. 

Through these codes, professional institutions forge an implicit social contract with other members of society: Trust us to control and exercise jurisdiction over this important occupational category. In return, the profession promises, we will ensure that our members are worthy of your trust—that they will not only be competent to perform the tasks they have been entrusted with, but they will conduct themselves with high standards and integrity. On balance we believe that a profession, with well-functioning institutions of discipline, will curb misconduct because moral behavior is an integral part of the identity of professionals: a self-image most are motivated to maintain. 

Reference: http://hbr.harvardbusiness.org/2008/10/its-time-to-make-management-a-true-profession/ar/1  & "It's Time to Make Management a True Profession." ''Harvard Business Review'' print edition, October 2008.

Competing students (250+) in teams utilized the No. 1 world's best-selling business simulation software (Capstone, Capsim Corporation, USA) globally in use for C-suite selection by large companies - featured in the annual report of The Hague University - source (viewer page 49): http://docplayer.nl/17440496-Mensen-tellen-de-gezichten-achter-onze-successen.html

profile_positions.description:
Practice in fields of business development;  future studies, marketing, joint ventures (including Asia), mergers & acquisitions, general management and board issues.

Twenty - Five years+++ of experience in serving corporate, scientific and academic industries.  Clients include  small (venture capital backed) as well as stock market listed companies, including Global 500, some NGOs.  Adjunct and consulting appointments with Business Schools and R&D centers.  In depth understanding of the mindset of both junior and senior international business Executives (EU, USA and Asia).  Broadly educated (PhD + MBA).  

Specialties: Mergers & Acquisitions, Business Models, Advanced Estate Planning, Executive Coaching, Board Issues.
profile_positions.title: Consultant (PhD + MBA)

profile_positions.description:
Direct activities and confer with patent attorneys, engineering, database management, tax and bank relationships. Chair board meetings. Conceive, design and specify new personal care and biomedical device(s) technology and creation of awareness via new media, etc.

Raising of early stage venture capital, overall management and marketing strategy.  Writing content for all corporate communications, including Internet. Attend trade shows. Applied for, obtained and issued USA patents. Presentations for investors, licensing and strategic partners. Environmental scanning for new applications and needs for future design in interactive media and technologies based on new science and new markets. 

Obtained all remaining outstanding shares after management buy-out of other shareholders.
profile_positions.title: President & CEO, Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
Writing and publication of formal peer reviewed research papers (30+), including The American Journal of Obstetrics and Gynecology, The American Journal of Otolaryngology, Hearing Research, Epilepsia, Journal of Developmental Psychobiology, Military Medicine, Fetal and Maternal Medicine Review, etc. 

Assist in grant writing (combined over US$ 3M). Execution of medical research. Public speaking at international conferences. Interacting with public media, including live radio interviews. Management of alliances, graduate students and complex multidisciplinary projects. Ranked No. 1 (tied) in the state of Florida, according to U.S. News & World Report’s annual adult specialty Best Hospitals rankings: www.linkedin.com/hp/update/6166589712225042432. Oldest University in Florida, USA.  

Featured in departmental 5 year progress report on Internet scientific exchanges. Awarded annual salary increases of 25% + consultant contracts for 1 month/year till 2000.
profile_positions.title: External Communications, Research Scholar, Fund Raising

profile_positions.description:
Transformation of artistic content into an acoustical or multimedia product. Public display of man-machine art/music objects (Mauricio Kagel). (Co)design and build studios for composers (Ferry Ridderhof, Peter Garnefsky), recording and multi-media applications. 

Production of live (broadcast) concerts of both students and faculty members - nationally. Instruction and education of (aspiring) composers in classic and state of the art technology related to creative new processes and techniques. Management of budgets, alliances and facilitates. Informing management and external parties of new developments of technology and the arts.  Producer and facilitator for large scale projects with international guest composers, touring musicians and artists in residence including John Cage, Karl Heinz Stockhausen, Michael Brecker, Dave Weckl, Dizzy Gillespie, etc.  No. 1 ranking achieved for the The Netherlands after awarded the status of "excellent" by the Dutch / Flemisch accreditation organization 'NVAO' (https://www.koncon.nl/en/about-kc/accreditations,https://www.koncon.nl/storage/media/rapport-Bachelor-Music-2016.pdf). With only 1% evaluated receiving such award, hence, making it the best conservatoire of The Netherlands - founded in 1816.  

Featured twice in the quarterly publication the ‘Royal K’ on the 1st computer based music production studio in The Netherlands and in an Interview with (USA) avant - garde composer John Cage.  Awarded full tenure after 1 year.
profile_positions.title: Producer, Educator

profile_positions.company: SEIN - Expertisecentrum voor epilepsie en slaapgeneeskunde
profile_positions.description:
Liaison work related to engineering, scientific and clinical personnel. 

Prepare for and collect physiological data for diagnostic and scientific purposes. Writing of clinical reports and collaborate with research projects. Management of projects related to brain, sensory, pharmacokinetics and sleep research well as mobile biomedical devices. 

Published in the Journal of Clinical Neurophysiology and Electroencephalography about colour and photosensitivity as well as for abstracts and a book chapter on sleep. Awarded full tenure after 1 year.
profile_positions.title: Liaison, Clinical Services, Research Management
